name: Cuber adventure
description:
"The fun will never end"

By creating more memory of adventure time the show will never end in my heart. This is a fan game I created as a tribute to my favorite show Adventure time. Disclaimer: I do not own any of the art, and the music is royalty free.

[WARNING THIS GAME IS VERY COMPLICATED]

What is this game about:

This is a management strategy game the comprise of multiple adventure time character that you can buff to win battles and gain Graybles gems which is a currency to upgrade, and create more character.  

Important information:

You can right click on most of the user interface and a tool tip will appear to give you more information. Sorry there is no tutorial so you just have to experiment around.

Thank you for playing my game.
